scripts.tests: npx wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite signup ; allure generate _results_  ; allure serve _results_/allure-raw

scripts.candidate_sign_up: npx wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite candidate_sign_up ; allure generate _results_  ; allure serve _results_/allure-raw
scripts.find_job: npx wdio ./wdio.conf.js --suite find_job ; allure generate _results_  ; allure serve _results_/allure-raw
